title: Another gold rush in San Francisco.
description:
Delightful scene report about a bunch of children who think they’re building god. Highlights include: appearances from Dumpster Boyfriend, “a sperm-racing start-up,” and “Carsten, a Swiss German 27-year-old who was designing AI-involved sandals but recently pivoted to drug testing.” Claude, is this a top signal?

title: At Tirupati Temple, AI To Take Over Crowd Control, Darshan Management
description: Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu will inaugurate a new, state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence-Integrated Command Control Centre at the Tirumala Tirupati temple.
content:
Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu will inaugurate a new, state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence-Integrated Command Control Centre (ICC) at the Tirumala Tirupati temple.

title: AI and credit: How can we keep machines from reproducing social biases?
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) has revolutionized many fields in recent years, including the banking sector. There have been both positive and negative aspects of its implementation, in particular the issue of algorithmic discrimination in lending.

content:

title: Google says 90% of tech workers are now using AI at work
description: By Lisa Eadicicco, CNN New York (CNN) — The overwhelming majority of tech industry workers use artificial intelligence on the job for tasks like writing and modifying code, a new Google study has found. title: Brazil's WEG to invest $77 million to boost US plant capacity due to AI demand
description: Brazilian motor maker WEG will invest $77 million in a U.S. specialty transformer manufacturing facility, it said on Tuesday, seeking to increase the plant's production capacity by 50% as artificial intelligence fuels demand in the country.
content:
The investment in the Washington, Missouri, plant targets the production of transformers seen as essential to supporting the expansion of industrial manufacturing, data centers and grid stability in the U.S., according to WEG.

title: Nadal complains of AI advertising scam using his image
description: Former tennis superstar Rafael Nadal said Tuesday an artificial intelligence likeness of him is being used to advertise without permission. "Together with my team, we have detected that fake videos generated by artificial intelligence are circulating on some platforms, in which a figure that imitates my image and voice appears," said Nadal in a statement on social media.

title: Young workers brace for job losses to AI, seniors shrug it off, Deutsche Bank survey says
description: Nearly one quarter of young professionals worry that they will lose their jobs to artificial intelligence, whereas the older workers are less concerned, according to a Deutsche Bank survey.
